modName: No magic ninja ai dodge - Slower Mage Backward Sprinting
summary:
Should prevent NPCs from doing magic flash steps to evade your arrows/bolts.

Now with additional option for slower backwards sprinting mages.
descriptionHtml:
I finally got fed up with NPCs acting like ninjas, dodging arrows and bolts magically with hammer-timing aside especially when i am sneaking and they don't even know that there just got an arrow fired at them.

This is nothing grand, this esp just sets the dodge chance to 0.

===========================================================================================
There's an alternative esp, which will ADDITIONALLY slow backward sprinting mages. Both effects in one esp.
===========================================================================================

I know this has already been done in SkyTweak, but i don't want SkyTweak only for one setting, pretty sure i'm not alone on this, so that's that.

I did a run from Halted Stream Camp over Silent Moons to Fort Greymoor only with a bow and not one of the Bandits dodged an arrow.

No scripts attached or anything.





Any comments regarding balance or disliking this mod will be considered rude and non-constructive and will be deleted.
